personality.description: A challenger brand persona that rebels against complacent, bland financial services with cultural fluency, wit, and directness.
personality.core_identity: MoneyLion is the boastful yet approachable friend who has under-the-radar intel and insider knowledge about money. We challenge the financial establishment by making money conversations accessible, entertaining, and empowering.

positioning.statement: We are the trusted source for making your best money decisions.
positioning.value_prop: MoneyLion gives me the power to achieve my financial aspirations.

target_audience.name: Future MoneyLions
target_audience.description: Working- and middle-class Americans (18-40) who are often underserved by traditional banks. Credit-invisible or subprime, living paycheck to paycheck or navigating income volatility, actively trying to build credit, stabilize cash flow, and improve long-term financial health.
target_audience.psychographic: Not afraid to spend their hard-earned money. Need to improve credit scores and get fast access to cash that lets them level-up their lifestyles.

voice_pillars.name: Live Richly
voice_pillars.description: MoneyLion helps people live richly — we've got the tips, tools, and tech to make it happen.
directives: Don't be shy about our capabilities
Inspire by painting an aspirational picture of their life
Hint at the future humblebrag (vacay, home remodel, splurge purchase)
Focus on positive financial outcomes, not negative

voice_pillars.name: Share The Secret
voice_pillars.description: MoneyLion doesn't believe in hoarding wealth or knowledge. It's more valuable and rewarding to share the experience.
directives: Invite people in on the secret — tell them something that feels special
Write conversationally, almost like texting a friend
Relate to people on a human level — think about the context of their situation

voice_pillars.name: Roar More!
voice_pillars.description: Whether finances are good or bad, MoneyLion makes the impossible possible. We stand out by defying limits and creating humblebrags.
directives: Leave a lasting memory that won't be forgotten
Elicit a strong emotional reaction — a laugh, a smirk, a raised eyebrow
Think of humblebrags as a way for Future MoneyLions to spread the word

voice_pillars.name: No Bull$hit
voice_pillars.description: MoneyLion heroes individuals, self-starters, and entrepreneurs who want to take control of their money. We tell it like it is.
directives: Make finance simple, clear, and easy to understand
Remember the audience — normal people who might not have financial knowledge
Avoid jargon and acronyms — if you must use them, spell it out entertainingly

voice_features: Cultural — shaped by movies, music, social media, pop culture
